title: How tall is Justin Bieber? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve heard many people say they’ve met him and don’t believe 5′9. I’ve also seen YouTube videos on his height and he’s almost same height as Selena Gomez who’s 5′5. And slightly taller than dj khaled who’s 5′6 So in speculation, Bieber is 5′6 or 5′7
